title.value: Data Standards Wales UEC Attendance Category

description.value: This CodeSystem lists reason for the patient's attendance.

display.value: Unplanned first Urgent and Emergency Care or Same Day Emergency Care Attendance for a new clinical condition (or deterioration of a chronic condition).

Unplanned follow up Urgent and Emergency Care or Same Day Emergency Care Attendance for the same or a related clinical condition and within 7 days of the first Urgent and Emergency Care or Same Day Emergency Care Attendance at this Urgent and Emergency Care service.

Unplanned follow-up Urgent and Emergency Care or Same Day Emergency Care Attendance for the same or a related clinical condition and within 7 days of the First Urgent and Emergency Care or Same Day Emergency Care Attendance at ANOTHER Urgent and Emergency Care service.

Planned follow-up Urgent and Emergency Care or Same Day Emergency Care Attendance within 7 days of the First Urgent and Emergency Care or Same Day Emergency Care Attendance at THIS Urgent and Emergency Care service.
Not Applicable (Patient dead on arrival to Urgent and Emergency Care service.)
